name: Dummy mail aliases
description: Generate aliases with a predefined base for testing

preferences.name: Base
preferences.description: Dummy mail base. E.g email in <email>+ext@domain.tld

preferences.name: Extension
preferences.description: Dummy mail extension. E.g ext n email+<ext>@domain.tld

preferences.name: Domain
preferences.description: Dummy mail domain. E.g domain.tld n email+ext@<domain.tld>
